About Me

Hi, I'm Evan, a Computer Engineering student at Memorial University of Newfoundland, I am the Software Co-Lead for Eastern Edge Robotics, a team competing in the MATE ROV Competition. This June, Eastern Edge is travelling to Alpena, Michigan!

In my spare time, I like to work on projects such as Claret, an easy-to-use schedule builder for Memorial University students. I love to hear suggestions regarding Claret, so if you have one be sure to let me know! I also enjoy collecting vinyl and have published a list the of records I own. Additionally, I manage a homelab, which I've recently migrated to NixOS. I've written a blog post about my experience, which you can find here.

You can explore more of my work here.

Skills

Go, Rust, TypeScript, C++, C, SQL, Java

Linux, Docker, Nix, Puppet, ROS 2

React, Astro, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
